node.name: custom5AOV
node.label: AOV
node.author: DRL
node.help: This node doesn't do anything with it's components. It just passes them through and makes given custom parameters as an AOVs. ATTENTION: you really don't want to use this node more then once in any shader. If you want to add more AOVs, use similar nodes with more outputs.

property.name: input
property.help: Any color component used just for connecting this node to shader network.

property.help: Color you want to output as an AOV.
